meanings.definition: Relating to the killing of eggs.
meanings.sent1: The ovicidal spray effectively destroyed the insect eggs.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used an ovicidal treatment to prevent the eggs from hatching.
meanings.sent3: The ovicidal solution made sure no baby insects would bother the plants.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze was ovicidal, as if she could annihilate any potential offspring.
meanings.sent5: The ovicidal effect of the chemical was swift and thorough.

meanings.sent1: The ovicidal properties of the pesticide were well-known in the farming community.
meanings.sent2: The ovicidal nature of the treatment ensured the eggs would not survive.
meanings.sent3: The ovicidal spray was like a superhero protecting the crops from future threats.
meanings.sent4: The ovicidal power of the chemical was unmatched in its ability to eradicate eggs.
meanings.sent5: The ovicidal substance acted quickly to eliminate any chance of egg survival.

meanings.sent1: The farmer applied the ovicidal to protect his crops from pests.
meanings.sent2: The ovicidal was stored safely away from children and animals.
meanings.sent3: The ovicidal was the secret weapon against unwanted insect populations.
meanings.sent4: The ovicidal worked wonders in controlling the pest infestation.
meanings.sent5: The ovicidal's effectiveness in destroying eggs was unmatched in the market.
